screenshots.caption: Target path of installation is the Saver2 current directory

name: Saver2 AutoRestart
short_description:
This program automatically closes the Saver2 application for 10 minutes every 4 hours to avoid your account to be blocked by the Pandora's website for several days. This temporary blacklisting could happen after too many hours of continuous listening. It happend to me and was very frustrating, that's why I've started this project.

Said shortly, Saver2 AutoRestart is a kind of Pandora anti-blacklist add-on for the Saver2 audio streaming client.

As explained by ZigZagJoe on his website, "Saver2 is for educational use only. Do not use the software in a way that would contravene any music copyright laws. Any information provided by this software is for educational purposes only. No function is implied or in any way guaranteed."

Click the link below to visit the Saver2 AutoRestart Web Site and get more details.
summary: Anti-blacklist add-on for the Saver2 streaming client
